title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“We can't make good grammar great. But we want to make flawed writing acceptable.” [Lance A. Miller, in the Wall Street Journal, September 29, 1983. Submitted by Robert O. Vaughn, West New York, New Jersey.]
